channel.title: Roonscape - The RS2006 Remake
channel.description:
[center][img]http://roonscape.org/img/rs_logo.png[/img][/center][url=http://www.roonscape.org/]Roonscape[/url] is being relaunched if anyone didn't know. The base we are using is Hyperion released by Graham and its team. Our process and media will be able to find on our website, the link to our website is: [url=http://www.roonscape.org]Roonscape - the Runescape 2006 remake![/url]. We will be trying to update you delay on here and our website, Updates below are in server of course, hopefully we meet once again! [u]Notice[/u]: I also posted this on r-s under the username "Roonscape"
[b][url=http://roonscape.org/][img]http://roonscape.org/img/title2/play.gif[/img] Website[/url][/b] [b][url=http://roonscape.org/forums/][img]http://roonscape.org/img/title2/comment.gif[/img] Forums[/url][/b]
Red means that we haven't started on it. Orange means that we have started on it but not finished it yet.(Xtra checking it for bugs / equal +-RuneScape) Green means that we have finished it!
[b][size=1.35em]Combat:[/size][/b]
[ul][li][img]http://roonscape.org/img/hiscores/skill_icon_attack1.gif[/img]Melee Combat[/li] [li][img]http://roonscape.org/img/hiscores/skill_icon_range1.gif[/img]Range Combat[/li] [li][img]http://roonscape.org/img/hiscores/skill_icon_magic1.gif[/img]Magic Combat[/li][/ul]
[b][size=1.35em]Skills:[/size][/b]
[ul][li][img]http://roonscape.org/img/hiscores/skill_icon_agility1.gif[/img]Agility[/li] [li][img]http://roonscape.org/img/hiscores/skill_icon_cooking1.gif[/img]Cooking[/li] [li][img]http://roonscape.org/img/hiscores/skill_icon_crafting1.gif[/img]Crafting[/li] [li][img]http://roonscape.org/img/hiscores/skill_icon_farming1.gif[/img]Farming[/li] [li][img]http://roonscape.org/img/hiscores/skill_icon_firemaking1.gif[/img]Firemaking[/li] [li][img]http://roonscape.org/img/hiscores/skill_icon_fishing1.gif[/img]Fishing[/li] [li][img]http://roonscape.org/img/hiscores/skill_icon_fletching1.gif[/img]Fletching[/li] [li][img]http://roonscape.org/img/hiscores/skill_icon_herblore1.gif[/img]Herblore[/li] [li][img]http://roonscape.org/img/hiscores/skill_icon_mining1.gif[/img]Mining[/li] [li][img]http://roonscape.org/img/hiscores/skill_icon_prayer1.gif[/img]Prayer[/li] [li][img]http://roonscape.org/img/hiscores/skill_icon_runecraft1.gif[/img]Runecrafting[/li] [li][img]http://roonscape.org/img/hiscores/skill_icon_slayer1.gif[/img]Slayer[/li] [li][img]http://roonscape.org/img/hiscores/skill_icon_smithing1.gif[/img]Smithing[/li] [li][img]http://roonscape.org/img/hiscores/skill_icon_thieving1.gif[/img]Thieving[/li] [li][img]http://roonscape.org/img/hiscores/skill_icon_woodcutting1.gif[/img]Woodcutting[/li][/ul]
[b][size=1.35em]Media:[/size][/b] [img]http://roonscape.org/img/screenshots/shots/enchanting.bmp[/img] [img]http://roonscape.org/img/screenshots/shots/gem_cutting.bmp[/img] [img]http://i42.tinypic.com/jtwaqx.png[/img] [img]http://www.roonscape.org/img/screenshots/shots/free_chardesign.png[/img]
[b][size=1.35em]Support signature:[/size][/b] [img]http://i.imgur.com/XwkxE.png[/img][img]http://i.imgur.com/BXDOR.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/74Z0E.png[/img][img]http://i.imgur.com/HbxjU.png[/img]
[b][size=1.35em][u]Developers(Server & Website)[/u][/size][/b]
[ul][li][b]Mod Johan[/b][/li] [li][b]Mod [/b][b]Vayken[/b][/li][/ul]

item.title: Roonscape - The RS2006 Remake
item.dc:creator: @massive_remake massive remake
item.description:
@massive_remake wrote:

[quote=“m1lkman, post:17, topic:424892”][quote author=massive remake link=topic=527553.msg3849097#msg3849097 date=1323877218]

Wasn’t this up before?

Yes we used to run it for a while, but then it all got fucked up by people who don’t want us to get online. We will now fuck them even harder by getting it online once again.

Did you change anything that will help you keep it online? Kind of retarded if you think rehosting it will fuck them over.

We have changed allot of in-game content. It’s the feeling that you will get, but mainly wanna have it online because we want a real re-make online.

What? So you didn’t change anything server-sided?

What? Lol no, we changed allot server sided just won’t saying check out pics prob.
[/quote]

When other people brought your server dwon originally, did you do something so that it won’t happen again?[/quote]

O like that, yes we did. We fully changed everything related to connections.

Meeper.:

Just a question and this isn’t reffering to you in peticular but if there is atleast 100 06-07 remakes what makes yours special? I just don’t see how any of them are special if you all have the same things… Good luck I guess…

We started way before most of them, we where like one of the third/fourths before they become hot. Yet people half ass it or leave it when they won’t get further. We will not try to do that, we will get it online and running for you and others.

Read full topic

item.title: Roonscape - The RS2006 Remake

item.description:
@Meeper1 wrote:

item.title: Roonscape - The RS2006 Remake
item.dc:creator: @massive_remake massive remake
item.description:
@massive_remake wrote:

[center][/center]Roonscape is being relaunched if anyone didn’t know. The base we are using is Hyperion released by Graham and its team. Our process and media will be able to find on our website, the link to our website is: Roonscape - the Runescape 2006 remake!. We will be trying to update you delay on here and our website, Updates below are in server of course, hopefully we meet once again! Notice: I also posted this on r-s under the username “Roonscape”

Website
Forums

Red means that we haven’t started on it.
Orange means that we have started on it but not finished it yet.(Xtra checking it for bugs / equal ±RuneScape)
Green means that we have finished it!

[size=1.35em]Combat:[/size]

[ul][li]Melee Combat[/li]
[li]Range Combat[/li]
[li]Magic Combat[/li][/ul]
